Class List

Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
com.fernferret.android.fortywinks.AlarmAn incredible implementation of a very versitile Alarm
com.fernferret.android.fortywinks.AlarmLineItemCustom view that allows listing ov all Alarms that are currently active (excluding QuickAlarms)
com.fernferret.android.fortywinks.DayDisplayCustom View that displays 2 text areas, one to show a description, the other to show week days
com.fernferret.android.fortywinks.DBAdapterDatabase adapter that allows easy communication with the SQLite DB with handeling of injection attacks
com.fernferret.android.fortywinks.EditAlarmThe activity that allows adding/editing of alarms
com.fernferret.android.fortywinks.FortyPrefsPreferencesActivity that loads and inflates the XML resource for app prefs
com.fernferret.android.fortywinks.FortyWinksThe primary application class that is allowed to be launched from the homescreen
com.fernferret.android.fortywinks.ListAlarmsProvides a listing of all alarms using the AlarmLineItem view
com.fernferret.android.fortywinks.PreferenceViewA Special view that has 2 text components that can be re-aligned
com.fernferret.android.fortywinks.PreferenceViewAdapterAn extension of the ArrayAdapter to allow the drawer to show multiple quick alarms
com.fernferret.android.fortywinks.ProposedAlarmProvides the means for creating potential alarms
com.fernferret.android.fortywinks.SingleAlarmAn alarm that fires off only once
com.fernferret.android.fortywinks.WakeUpAlertActivity that will allow the user to dismiss alarms
